scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.node.json && npm run generate-icons && tsc && vite build && npm run copy-files
scripts.generate-icons: node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' scripts/generate-icons.ts
scripts.copy-files: node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' scripts/build.ts
